    ''' OR UpdatedOn > ''',
    item().LastLoadTime,
    ''''
)

text.value:
UPDATE stg.etlControl
SET LastLoadTime = GETUTCDATE()
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}'

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('stg.spPolicy', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    TRUNCATE TABLE stg.TransactionSLA;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE 
    @responsibleSysRole   INT         = NULL,        -- pass in the user’s role or NULL
    @todaysDate           DATETIME    = GETDATE(),   -- or pass in your “today’s Date”
    @DefaultFirstFollowUp INT         = 4,          
    @DefaultSecondFollowUp INT        = 6,          
    @HRRoleValue          INT         = 2,           
    @BrokerRoleValue      INT         = 3;           

SELECT
    wf.WorkflowId,
    wf.SubmittedOn,
    wf.CompletedOn,
    COALESCE(psla.FirstFollowUp,
             csla.FirstFollowUp,
             @DefaultFirstFollowUp)   AS SLAFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp,
             csla.SecondFollowUp,
             @DefaultSecondFollowUp)  AS SLASecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
        wf.CompletedOn,
        wf.UpdatedOn,
        client.OfficeLocationId,
        wf.WorkflowTypeId,
        wf.WorkflowStatusId,
        wf.LastResubmissionTAT,
        wf.LastResubmissionDate,
        wf.TAT,
        @todaysDate
    )                      AS Tat,
    wf.WorkflowStatusId,
    wf.WorkflowTypeId,
    wf.PendingActionRoleId,
 CASE 
  WHEN dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.FirstFollowUp, csla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp)
  THEN 
   CASE WHEN
    dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp, csla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) 
    THEN 'Red'
    ELSE 'Yellow'
    END
  ELSE 'Green'
 END AS SLAColor,
 CASE 
  WHEN dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp, csla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
  THEN 0  
  ELSE 1
 END AS IsTransactionSLA
FROM dbo.Policy AS policy
INNER JOIN dbo.PolicyCategory      AS policyCategory
    ON policy.PolicyId = policyCategory.PolicyId
   AND policyCategory.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.MemberPolicyCategory AS memberPolicyCategory
    ON policyCategory.PolicyCategoryId = memberPolicyCategory.PolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Category            AS category
    ON policyCategory.CategoryId = category.CategoryId
   AND category.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.Member               AS member
    ON memberPolicyCategory.MemberId = member.MemberId
   AND member.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.WorkflowMember    AS workflowMember
    ON memberPolicyCategory.MemberPolicyCategoryId = workflowMember.MemberPolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Workflow             AS wf
    ON workflowMember.WorkflowId = wf.WorkflowId
   AND wf.IsCompleted = 0
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA             AS psla
    ON psla.PolicyId = policy.PolicyId
   AND psla.SLAProcessTypeId = wf.WorkflowTypeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA            AS csla
    ON csla.CarrierId = policy.CarrierId
   AND csla.SLAProcessTypeId = wf.WorkflowTypeId
INNER JOIN dbo.Client               AS client
    ON policy.ClientId = client.ClientId
WHERE
    policy.IsDeleted = 0
    AND (
         dbo.IsBluePendingTask(wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId) = 1
      OR @responsibleSysRole IS NULL
      OR (
           @responsibleSysRole IS NOT NULL
       AND wf.PendingActionRoleId IS NOT NULL
       AND (
             (
               @responsibleSysRole = @HRRoleValue
           AND (wf.PendingActionRoleId = @HRRoleValue
             OR wf.PendingActionRoleId = @BrokerRoleValue)
             )
           OR wf.PendingActionRoleId = @responsibleSysRole
          )
      )
    )
	ORDER By WorkflowId;

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.TransactionSLA', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.TransactionSLA;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE 
    @DefaultFirstFollowUp INT = 4,
    @DefaultSecondFollowUp INT = 6,
    @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp INT = 5, 
    @TodayDate DATETIME = GETDATE();

SELECT 
    mc.MedicalClaimId,
    mc.DateReceived,
    
    COALESCE(settlpsla.FirstFollowUp, settlcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp) AS SettlementSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) AS SettlementSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.SettlementDate,
        c.ClientId 
    ) AS SettlementTat,

    COALESCE(evalpsla.FirstFollowUp, evalcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp) AS EvaluationSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(evalpsla.SecondFollowUp, evalcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) AS EvaluationSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.EvaluationDate,
        c.ClientId
    ) AS EvaluationTat,

    COALESCE(brpsla.FirstFollowUp, brcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp) AS BrokerReviewSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(brpsla.SecondFollowUp, brcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp) AS BrokerReviewSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.BrokerReviewDate,
        c.ClientId
    ) AS BrokerReviewTat,
    ISNULL(mc.IsOriginalsAwaited, 0) AS OriginalsAwaited,
    mc.DateClosed,
    CASE
        WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.FirstFollowUp, settlcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp)
        THEN CASE
            WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
                THEN 'Red'
            ELSE 'Yellow'
        END
        ELSE 'Green'
    END AS SLAColor,

    CASE
        WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
            THEN 0
        ELSE 1
    END AS IsTransactionSLA
FROM dbo.MemberPolicyCategory mpc
INNER JOIN dbo.PolicyCategory pc ON mpc.PolicyCategoryId = pc.PolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Category cat ON pc.CategoryId = cat.CategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Policy p ON pc.PolicyId = p.PolicyId
INNER JOIN dbo.MedicalClaim mc ON mpc.MemberPolicyCategoryId = mc.MemberPolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.WorkflowMedicalClaim wm ON mc.MedicalClaimId = wm.MedicalClaimId
INNER JOIN dbo.Carrier cr ON p.CarrierId = cr.CarrierId
INNER JOIN dbo.Client c ON p.ClientId = c.ClientId
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA settlcsla ON cr.CarrierId = settlcsla.CarrierId AND settlcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 1  -- 1 = MedicalClaimSettlementSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA settlpsla ON p.PolicyId = settlpsla.PolicyId AND settlpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 1
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA evalcsla ON cr.CarrierId = evalcsla.CarrierId AND evalcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 2  -- 2 = MedicalClaimEvaluationSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA evalpsla ON p.PolicyId = evalpsla.PolicyId AND evalpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 2
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA brcsla ON cr.CarrierId = brcsla.CarrierId AND brcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 3  -- 3 = MedicalClaimBrokerReviewSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA brpsla ON p.PolicyId = brpsla.PolicyId AND brpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 3
LEFT JOIN Workflow w ON wm.WorkflowId = w.WorkflowId
WHERE mc.DateClosed IS NULL
AND mc.IsDeleted = 0;
